ModMetadata.Name: Aproposmath's Stationeers Patches
ModMetadata.Author: aproposmath
ModMetadata.Description:
Various small patches/enhancements for Stationeers
- Show detailed mood and hygiene stats in the tooltips - Fix `StackSize` LogicType in IC10 to read the total number of a attached devices in a cable network - Fix indirect register access in `l` and `s` IC10 instructions (e.g. `s rr2 Setting 22`) - Fix access to defined numbers in `l` and `s` IC10 instructions (e.g. `s MYDEFINE Setting 42`) - Rotate content of logic displays if they are mounted upside down (disabled on newer game versions, where it's fixed already)
These patches/fixes can be enabled/disabled in the StationeersLaunchPad configuration menu at startup. This mod - Does not alter savegame files, you can add/remove it at any time without breaking something* - Is client-only, the server (or other players) do not need it in multiplayer games
* You will get errors again in IC10 scripts using `StackSize` of cable networks after removing the mod
[b]Installation[/b] This is a [b]StationeersLaunchPad[/b] Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
Source Code: https://github.com/aproposmath/AproposmathsStationeersPatches
